I once played this game back in 2013 on PS3 when it was offered on PS+. I played a few hours but just couldn't get into it. Fast forward almost 3 years, I purchased the game in the Bioshock Pack on Steam. Over the past few days, I've been playing the campaign and just beat it late last night. I must say, this is a very good game, and it shows that the developers took time in creating each and every square foot. The graphics are phenomenal, and the story is great. The better graphics and KB&M helped me get into the game since on PS3, I just didn't like it. This is one of those games that no one should miss out on.

Confesso que no começo estranhei o clima mais iluminado, mas conforme a história se desenrola, você vai curtindo o Infinite. O roteiro consegue aliar personagens cativantes aos cenários fantásticos! Sem contar que o final é muito satisfatório e "mindblowing"! 
Também muito bem legendado para o Português do Brasil. Com exceção de algumas expressões. 

Problema 1: bugs de inimigos travados, que algo comum em mapas grandes, mas no geral trazem boas lutas principalmente quando eles flanqueam. 
Problema 2: limitação quanto a troca de arma ou vigor durante as lutas.
Problema 3: aprimoramento de arma e vigor não é tão interessante quanto nos outros jogos anteriores.  

P.S.: Uma dica pra quem é fã da franquia: comprem as DLC's Burial at Sea. Valem realmente a pena, principalmente a última. 

No geral o Bioshock Infinite é uma das melhores aquisições, além de fechar muito bem a trama passada entre os três jogos (tomando em consideração as DLC's).

Short Review

As a game in general: 10/10 Have played again.

This is easily one of the best storylines that I have ever encountered. The game is beautiful and it's a lot of fun. This is a must play.


As a BioShock Game: 6/10

They completely changed the gameplay from the originals. In this game you can only carry 2 guns at a time, it's more linear (there's no choices to make and only 1 possible ending), it's a lot more fighting oriented and not very objective oriented. If you're a huge fan of the original games, then this game is most likely going to be a bit disappointing. You probably will still love the game, but it doesn't have the charm that got you hooked to the series in the first place. If you were given the game to play without seeing it's title, if wasn't for the Vigors (which are Plasmids) then you wouldn't have known it was a BioShock game.




Long Review

First off, if you haven't played the first do games then you better not play this yet. This game has much more of an impact if you've played Bioshock 1 & 2. 

So, I've played the first 2 games a number of times on PS3 and PC. I've played Infinite on my PS3 when it came out, and I've been wanting to play it again on PC. First off, this game is amazing for the most part. There were some things that bothered me a bit becuase they were different from the first 2 games, like the number of guns and plasmids that you could have and the fact that you cannot manually save. And though those things were a bit annoying, it did offer more of a challenge which isn't bad. I think the lack of a manually save is the most annoying thing though since there were a couple parts where the game automatically saved in the most possible spot, and there was no way back. 

*********WARNING********* Now this is where I was conflicted about reccommending the game. The game seems to have lots of issues on PC. For me, the game kept crashing every 2-5 minutes so it's pretty unplayable. I've looked up many possible solutions and none of them worked for me. From what I have read, many other people have had problems as well, but not everyone. I have a few friends who have played it on PC with no problems. So, since you can get refunds now, I would say try it out and if it doesn't work just return it. Just make sure you stay eligible for the return. From what I've seen from other people, that means you cannot have over 2 hours on this game or any other game that you purchased at the same time. So, you probably want to buy this game seperately. And since you can get a refund and the game does work for some people, I decided to reccomend it. 

I hope this game works for you. It's definitely one of the best games that I have ever played and then ending is just... WOW! I sat there for the entire ending (it's a longer ending) with my mouth just hanging open. 10/10 would play again... and again.. and again... and so on.

UPDATE: When I switched to Windows 10, I bought the game again and had no issues. Windows 7 users may encounter a problem. I'm pretty sure it had something to do with Direct x11 not working properly.

Lo bueno: Como FPS es uno de los mejores que he jugado. Buena historia, excelentes gráficos, personajes interesantes y una complejidad aceptable.
Lo malo: demadiados pentagramas, referencias al diablo y que más decir de una que otra blasfemia por aquí y por allá. ¿Cuál era el propósito de eso? ¿Burlarse de la religión? En ninguno de los Bioshock anteriores había semejantes cosas y el juego hubiera sido mucho mejor sin todo eso. Francamente, esa es una de las principales razones por la que no lo recomiendo.
Lo peor: que te obliguen a comprar los dos DLC para completar la historia de Booker y Elizabeth (son al menos 10$ que vas a tener que gastar si no quieres terminar a medias).

Un extra: no tiene multijugador. Terminas el juego y lo único que te queda es volverlo a jugar más díficil.

If you enjoy EXTREME FIGHTING! Insane abilities! Getting your head destroied by some of the most insane things ever. (I've said to much..) Then enjoying wanting to throw your computer out the window from the most insane thing ever! (SHUT UP YOU'VE SAID TO MUCH!) Then buy this game! Loved it! Then wanted to burn it!
aşık oldum

Bioshock Infinite: Un juego que marca una gran diferencia en la historia de los shooters, un shooter con mucha innovación a nivel de jugabilidad pero lo que quiero recalcar aquí es: La historia.
Todo el mundo sabe que la saga Bioshock destaca por la cualidad de tener una historia cuidada, con muchos detalles y con una profundidad narrativa que se aleja de las típicas cinemáticas, para transportarnos a la historia por medio de acciones, de detalles en los variados escenarios que tiene el juego.
En cuanto a los personajes, me atreve a decir que los personajes de Bioshock Infinite son perfectos, desde Booker DeWitt hasta los hermanos Lutece. 
La jugabilidad se ajusta como el jugador desee, los gráficos no tienen mucho en especial pero la iluminación es lo que los hace únicos y que se vea visualmente muy bonito.
En conclusión, Bioshock Infinite; un juego que en mi parecer merece un 10, a muchos les gustará a otros pocos lo odiarán pero eso depende de gustos.

I came across two Fink Guards arguing once. The male guard said, "Come on, Frannie, you're a modern woman. It's 1912." The female one replied, "It's gonna be 2012 before I’m interested in you!"
Anyway, I killed both of them.
R.I.P. Frannie & Unnamed Guard, married 2012-2016.
ign 23.5/10 - too much water

Яркий пример того, КАК нужно делать FPS - потрясающе красивый город Колумбия, огромная работа над мелочами: вывески, листовки, диктофоны и т.д., всё это позволяет окунуться в историю и атмосферу города. Отличная музыка, олицетворяющая время, в котором происходят события игры, иногда зайдя в очередное здание хочется остановиться и просто слушать. Геймплей на первый взгляд может показаться скучноватым, но стоит вспомнить про разнообразие так называемых энергетиков и вариантов их использования - игра преобретает новые краски. 
Ну и само собой сюжет, наверное самая сильная сторона данной игры, проходится практически на одном дыхании, он не линеен и постоянно заставляет игрока собирать его в единый пазл у себя в голове, концовка заставляет переосмыслить всё и хорошо поломать голову над финальной версией пазла. 
Если описывать игру как что-то целостное, то это скорее потрясающая история, чем просто интересный шутер, сам геймплей здесь больше для интерактивности и  погружения в происходящее. 
10/10

The storyline was interesting, though I felt it got away from them at the end.  This game is on sale quite often; take a gamble on it next time you see a price reduction of any kind.

Obwohl es nicht ganz so stark ist wie die Vorgänger der BioShock Reihe ist auch Infinite ein Muss für jeden BioShock Fan. Die utopische Story einer fliegenden Stadt ist magisch, aber leider kehren einige Elemente immer wieder zurück und es scheint, als ob dieser Teil nicht ganz so abwechslungsreich ist wie seine Vorgänger. Auch das Waffenhandling ist nicht ganz so geschmeidig wie in den vorigen zwei Teilen.
Trotzdem bringt auch dieses Spiel einige Stunden Spaß mit sich und macht Lust auf mehr.
Советую игру всем

游戏自带繁体中文，虽然介绍上没有写，但是买了之后可以在属性里面设置，想入手的赶紧了。
从游戏画面来看，真心不错，简直就是艺术。（虽然我也不怎么懂）这里的画面给我了一种很舒服的感觉，甚至让我忘记我深处雾埋之中，咳咳，开个玩笑。
从战斗方式来看，让我想起了羞辱，一手异能一手武器的，但是又大相径庭，这里唯一的暗杀，应该是从背后偷袭人家，我玩了15个小时通关，三个难度我选的是困难，而且路上基本上把该捡的都给捡了，我还是蛮喜欢FPS类游戏的，但是在这里选择了困难难度我感觉在某些方面还是挺吃力的，比如一个“精英怪”很难打死然而他打你几下你就跪了，当然，我把升级上限的药水都加在魔法上，生命和护盾才加了两三次吧，所以容易挂掉，战斗的时候你可以借助地图优势，异能，还有伊丽莎白的辅助干掉敌人，战斗多样化，并不是那么的枯燥乏味。（困难模式到后期真心难打，因为死了要扣钱，导致我都没钱升级武器和技能了）
伊丽莎白的设定让我觉得很合适，不影响我的战斗，还时不时的给我一些武器装备，增加了互动性，非战斗时有时还会和我聊天，也会做一些动作，感觉她栩栩如生，并不像机器人那么生硬，（有这么漂亮的小萝莉陪伴在左右能让心情好了很多）
最重要的是这个剧情，打一遍完全看不懂，因为里面涉及了平行雨中和少许的历史，通关之后我还在云里雾里的，然后我就去看剧透，然后一目了然，但是看完后就后悔了，我建议你们打前两遍别看剧透，如果两遍之后还不懂的话就可以看一下，当然，也可以多通关几次，都是很好的选择。
在游戏的时候我有几次不想玩下去，是因为怕玩完了就没了...但是还是忍不住，最后还是磨磨唧唧的通关了，通关之后心情很不爽，暂时没有下一部了，1和2也不怎么接这个剧情，没什么联系。
据说生化奇兵的下一部还在制作中，但是一切将从头再来（通关之后你就知道为什么下一部要一切从零，不接无限的剧情了，当然，重新制作只是一个传言，不知道真假），有可能会双主角，因为刺客信条：枭雄和羞辱2等多款游戏已经设定双主角了，希望下一部作品尽早有更多的信息，

Probably one of the best single player fps games I've gotten my hands on. Very exciting, alot of shooting and very interesting story. I believe the game could be improved and have abit more items and guns (you will understand if you play play it). However, still very nice and very good game to have in your steam library. The price for the game is a bit expensive, therefore I would recommend to buy this game when its on sale, unless you are desperate to buy it. 8.5/10

Set in Columbia, a floating city in the sky, you are thrust into a gripping story which had me and many other players hooked.

The deep storyline, great graphics great atmosphere and great presentation helps you get immersed into what may very well be the best story you have ever played. You need to have an open mind to play this game! Also make sure you follow along with the events that unravel throughout the game, when you do and it all clicks, you will be astonished!

10/10, Amazing Experience
Great gameplay, great graphics and great atmosphere. Also, the characters are the kind that makes it hard for you to not feel for them. Great game overall. In my opinion, truly a masterpiece.

确实是一款很不错的老作品，画面虽然不属于上乘， 但是在哥伦比亚的天空城当中依然可以感受到叫做“美轮美奂”的画面，风格类似于蒸汽朋克？说实话我不太懂，但是略微复古的设定加上非常清新的画风，在发生战斗之前的一段时间可以说是一边玩一边观光，枪械加上魔法的设定的确让我想起了《羞辱》，但是本作的风格绝对没有那么压抑，以前听说《生化奇兵：无限》还有深刻的宗教内涵，但是恕我英语不是很好有些确实看不懂，也没有体会到诸如此类，但是看着画面一边突突突一遍狂放各种较为酷炫（华丽还算不上吧）的魔法，让我一上手就一口气没停地玩了4个小时直接没吃午饭。而且在打折期价格我认为是合理的，关键自带官方繁体中文。所以，如果可以接受上述的风格和设定的话，还是很不错的作品，当然，这个游戏在我看来算不上单纯的突突突，和COD、BF之类的是完全两码事。
=======================分割====================================
通关以后的感想，感觉真的是看了一场电影，结局的出人意料，世界的架构我真是不得不佩服游戏制作者，我还是缓一段时间再好好写吧。

[h1]Easily the best game I have ever played.[/h1]

[i]Outstanding graphics, cunning gameplay and a riveting story.[/i]

The game encourages you to use everything you have, aswell as your environment to your advantage. The fights are climatic and you'll breathe a sigh of relief everytime you hear the fight-sequence music conclude.

The characters are deep and add a lot to the overall story.  You come to know and love the main characters, Booker and Elizabeth, as they learn a lot about each other.

The story itself is deep and brilliantly crafted.  The ending is blind-blowing and makes the whole game worth replaying just to find subtle hints in its meaning and significance.

You dont need to play Bioshock or Bioshock 2, but I recommend playing them in order for a few reasons:
i) Story-wise, the end of Infinite will tie a few things together
ii) Solidify the FPS mechanics unique to the series (ei: plasmids/ vigors)
iii) The anticipation for Infinite is so real (and worth it!!!)

Geçte olsa 2015 sonu yılbaşı indiriminden aldım oyun hikeyi ve ilerleyişi kopuk ama bir okadarda fantastik eski bioshock larla alakası yok bitirdiğimizde sizi şok eden bir sonla karşıyorsunuz extra epsod larla da öteki seriere ve ana karakterimizin geçmişine bağlama çekmişler gene extrakarda güzel challecler var sonuş olarak oynaması zevkli başladımı kalkılmıyor başından tamsiyem denemeniz

I kinda rushed through the story in this game, I plan on replaying it. But from what i did play it is honestly the best story game i have ever played before. I really made a connection to the characters in this game. When things happened to certain characters in the game i honestly was sad. Best game i have ever played. Bioshock infinite will definitely pull you in and make you have a connection to the characters no matter what happens. Would definitely recomend it even if you havent played the ones before it.

Bioshock Infinite is a tunnel game with polished graphics and ham-fisted political messaging throughout. In other words, it looks good but the gameplay is, in sum, terrible and it feels like you just sat through a Howard Zinn lecture in video game format. 

Bioshock Infinite doesn't resemble the previous two brilliant games in terms of gameplay. If you've played them, then do yourself a favor and don't mar the series for yourself by playing this. Leave your overall franchise experience intact. If you get this game for cheap or free and haven't played the others, then go for it as you might be mildly impressed despite the unavoidable realization that the game is on rails.

To illustrate: this game is much, much worse in comparison to its predecessor games than Mass Effect 3 was to its predecessors. And that's saying something.

I'll never understand the high metacritic score for this game. For me, it proves how much gamers can be swayed almost solely by graphical polish.

Ich find es ehrlich gesagt ziemlich dröge und langweilig. Ok, bin generell nicht so Story Fan, Es soll was abgehen in solchen Games.
Übersicht, vor allem in Sachen neben Missionen ist schlecht, Waffen Auswahl mager, man kann höchstens 2 verscheide gleichzeitig in Besitz haben.
Irgendwie ist es mehr oder weniger ein Durchhangeln durch Dialoge, Schiesserein, wo es fast nur auf schnell entecken und zurückballern ankommt und hin und her Gerenne dazwischen.
Kein taktischer Anspruch, die marginale Waffen Auswahl verunmöglicht das Verwenden der richtigen Waffe in der richtigen Situation.
Und ich mag einfach keine Spiele, wo der Schweirigkeitsgrad in erster Linie durch Unübersichlichkeit (Keine Maps), Überraschungen (Mss man halt die Szene 2x spielen), mangelhaften Optionen (2 Waffen Typen)  und am Schluss allenfalls noch durch knappe Munitionvorräte ( = fang level von vorne an) künstlich hoch gehalten wird.
  
Das Einzige was wirklich gut ist: Grafik und Art Design sind wirklich schön...

Weiss nicht, vieleicht hab ich einfach zu Lange und zu viel Borderlands 2 / Presequel / Borderlands 1 gespielt.
Sorry in Sachen Action, Bedienungskomort, Übersicht, taktischem Anspruch, Witz, Berförderungssystem und selbst Story Fortgang kann auch dieses Game der Borderlands- Reihe einfach nicht das Wasser reichen. Nicht mal dem ersten Borderlands, das von den folgenden Zweien in Sachen Speilspasss noch weit übertroffen wird. 
Da spiel ich lieber nochmals Boderlands 2  / presequel mit neuen Figuren durch. Macht einfach mehr Spass!

Bioshock infinite is one of the best examples of why video games should be considered an art form. *Note*, this game heavily relies on its story to deliver the price that you paid for. Along with other reviewers, yes the gameplay can get repetitive at times as many of the things you have to do consist of killing someone, or getting a certain item. This is a minor gripe as most of the time the objective will be mixed up with new enemies and utilizing different tears so the game doesn't go stale. Bioshock infinite uses the multiverse theory in its story so depending on how much you know about it, you'll either be satisfied/ heartbroken at the ending or be confused. In summary, stop reading this review and buy this game as I enjoyed every second of it.

If you like action based combat shooters and story rich RPGs, this game is for you.
Bioshock Infinite combines those elements without neglecting any part. Nothing is left out, and it is a hell lot of fun to play through the story.
Normally I would not spend my precious time writing a game review but I was fascinated by how the story was put together, and the way it was made possible for me to experience it.
This game is definitely worth buying.

The best shooter game ever made!

I have played this game and finished it once, and i'm playing it all over again. It's truly an amazing game, it's so unique and different from all other 1st person shooters. This game actually has a story, a very deep and meaningful story. That communication between the main characters is just - gold. The game has super interesting dialogues, storyline, characters, setting, atmosphere, visual effects, gameplay...literally everything, I don't see any flaws, well maybe just one - I want more, it was not enough for me!
Voice acting in this game is also on point, I really like Troy Baker's voice acting and I think his voice really suits the main character, well done. I also really like that era/century in the game + it has something from steam-punk which is totally great. The story is so twisted totally mind-blowing and mesmerizing, that world just makes you fall right into its arms.
The game is a masterpiece, and I rarely call games like that haha Definitely worth playing and spending your money on.

My rating for this game - just like the title of the game - ∞ Infinite.

Unbelievable story and the gameplay is solid (difficult but never seems impossible).  I recommend on the first play through that you don't play above normal difficulty to get the full impact of the story.  I played the first time on difficult based on someone's recommendation but it was very distracting and the fire fights were much more time consuming than I would have liked.

N'ayant pas joué au précédent opus, je ne savais pas trop si ce jeu allait me convenir. Je me suis laissé convaincre par les commentaires que j'avais lu dans l'espace dédié. 

Et bien messieurs/dames vous aviez milles fois raison, ce jeu c'est le feu. 
Des graphismes très agréables, un univers que personnellement j'adore avec la petite dose de magie qui va bien (un peu à la dishonored avec un univers moins sombre). Et Elizabeth... très touchante.

En tout cas j'approuve à 100%

Mogę zaliczyć tę pozycję do listy najlepszych gier w jakie grałem.Ta część rzuciła zupełnie inne spojrzenie na serię Bioshocka z mojej strony.

Plusy:

- świetna grafika
- Niesamowita,niebanalna fabuła
- Elizabeth :)
- wiele rodzajów broni i możliwość ulepszania ich ( co było także w poprzednich częściach)

Minusy:

Jedyne co mogę zarzucić to za mało otwarty świat.

Moja ocena końcowa 9.2 / 10

Love this game! The graphics are nice even on the lowest setting and being in a world full of people just adds to the story as you explore.

我的天啊！游戏 可以这么的美！我要慢慢的看风景！因为恐怕再也没有超越这款游戏的作品了。伊莎贝拉！你好！跟着我我要救你！天空之城美轮美奂。天啊。值得购买！

Hayatımda oynadığım en güzel oyunlardan bir tanesi Bioshock İnfinite'dir heralde. Gerçekten atmosfer, hikaye, oynanış falan kusursuz denebilecek nadir oyunlardan. Oyunun sonuna geldiğinizde sadece ağzınız açık bir şekilde ekrana bakıyo olacaksınız. Kesinlikle oynamanız gereken bir oyun. Aynı zamanda Burial At Sea DLC lerini de oynamanız kesinlikle gerek, gerçi oyunu bitirirseniz kendiniz hemen DLC'leri de oynamak istiyeceksiniz kimsenin tavsiye etmesine gerek yok :)

                                           "Bring us the girl and wipe away the debt"

부커가 엘리자베스에게 반말 썼다 존댓말 썼다 하는 게 좀 거슬리기는 하지만 번역이 상당히 괜찮은 편 같고요, 일단은 배경이 무척 아름다워서 총질 하다가도 가끔씩 배경 구경ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ 그리고 스토리가 좋네요. 거의 후반부 쯤에 이야기가 좀 요상하게 흘러간다 싶더니만 육성으로 비명 지름..... 남들은 다 예상했는지 모르겠는데 저는 예상하지 못했던 반전이 두 개... 엔딩에서는 진짜 멍 때리면서 본 것 같네요.게다가, 다른 거 다 제쳐 두고 엘리자베스가 정말 좋았음 ㅠㅠㅠ필요할 때 제 때 제 때 던져주고, 성격도 매력있고 얼굴도 예쁘고...여튼 거짓말 하나 안 하고 정신없이 재미있게 플레이 했어요. 완전 적극 추천!!!
